thread.title: iQor Launches New Branding Campaign to Showcase Integrated Solutions
thread.title_full: iQor Launches New Branding Campaign to Showcase Integrated Solutions

author: admin
title: iQor Launches New Branding Campaign to Showcase Integrated Solutions
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/14/2015 @ 11:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: iQor 
ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- iQor introduced a new branding campaign today, including a new website ( www.iqor.com ), the new tagline Experience Matters , and marketing collateral which communicates the company’s unique set of integrated customer and product support solutions. 
In April 2014, iQor acquired the Aftermarket Services division of Jabil Circuit, providing the company with expanded capabilities that span the consumer value chain, from customer care and receivables management to product diagnostics and repair services. 
“Our new branding and positioning illustrates how our 32,000+ employees around the globe solve our clients’ most difficult challenges,” said Gary Cole, Executive Vice President, Sales & Marketing at iQor. “Our Experience Matters messaging reflects the evolution of iQor, the benefits of our integrated service delivery model, and our vision for the future. It also underlines how important experience is to our clients – whether that is the service experience we deliver to customers, or the strategic advice we offer based on our decades of experience.” 
Today, iQor is a recognized leader in customer contact solutions and aftermarket services. Its data analytics, supply chain and customer experience experts support clients in more than 60 countries, handling more than 96 million customer interactions and 9.5 million repairs each year. 
“Our clients are looking for partners who can analyze, integrate and impact the complete customer journey across an ever-increasing number of channels,” said Hartmut Liebel, Chief Executive Officer at iQor. “Through our diverse suite of offerings and solutions, we are able to help our clients break down existing functional silos and leverage data and analytics to create a more seamless, more rewarding customer experience at a lower cost to serve.” 
iQor offers deep industry knowledge and specialized solutions in nine industry segments. These include Media & Wireless, Consumer Electronics, Retail & Etail, Digital Infrastructure, Telecommunications, Healthcare, Financial Services & Insurance, Utilities and Transportation & Logistics. 
In addition, iQor is unveiling iQor LinQ today, a new vested commercial model that helps clients take a holistic view of their support ecosystem by connecting and sharing vital signals from customer interactions and their product support network. Unlike traditional, transactional-based models, iQor LinQ encourages innovation and enables a mutual reward for desired outcomes with its clients. When its clients succeed, so does iQor. 
“Nearly every industry we serve, from financial services to consumer electronics, is undergoing a massive amount of change,” said Liebel. “Through our unique customer engagement model, global scale and deep understanding of how to connect and integrate support ecosystems, iQor is well-positioned to help our clients navigate and succeed in this changing landscape. We invite them to learn more about our new wide range of integrated solutions.” 
iQor’s new global branding was developed in partnership with its creative agency, Brave People , based in Ybor City in downtown Tampa, Florida. 
About iQor 
iQor is a global provider of business process outsourcing and product support services with 32,000 employees in 17 countries. We partner with many of the world’s best-known brands to deliver aftermarket product and customer support solutions that span the consumer value chain, from customer care and receivables management to product diagnostics and repair services. Our award-winning technology, logistics and analytics platforms enable us to measure, monitor and analyze brand interactions, improve business processes and find operational efficiencies that lead to superior outcomes for our partners across the customer and product lifecycles. For more information, please visit us at www.iqor.com or follow us at @iQor and www.linkedin.com/company/iqor .
